snippet.title: 17.waves TD - Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2369760/17wavesTD

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/peartreegames/17waves

---
The 17 colonies of Exo-Planet W4-V35 are under attack!

Assemble your team of up to 4 players online and defend each base from enemy hordes.

 - Build towers to attack the enemies -- Plan out the best locations to place the various towers for maximum effectiveness.

 - Mine resources to replenish and upgrade the towers -- Towers consume energy and need constant upkeep.

- Upgrade your towers -- For your towers to be powerful enough to fend off late stage enemies, you'll need to upgrade them for maximum damage.

- Deposit coins from slain enemies to purchase more towers and player upgrades -- Everything costs a coin, or a few dozen. Coins will disappear if you don't get to them soon, but don't forget to maintain your towers!

- Defend your base -- Specialize each team member with one of seven unique upgrades. Like Fleet Foot, Lode Lorde, or Overclock!
